title: Uniform Child-Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act
context: [ยง583A-317] Costs and expenses. If the respondent is not the prevailing party, the court may assess against the respondent all direct expenses and costs incurred by the attorney general or county prosecuting attorney, as appropriate, and law enforcement officers under section 583A-315 or 583A-316. [L 2002, c 124, pt of ยง2]
